scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run nginx"
scripts.backend: cd backend && cross-env UV_THREADPOOL_SIZE=24 node --max-old-space-size=8192 --inspect index.js
scripts.nginx: cd nginx && (if not exist logs mkdir logs) && (if not exist temp mkdir temp) && nginx.exe
scripts.build: cd frontend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false BUILD_PATH=../build react-scripts build
scripts.backend:prod: cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production UV_THREADPOOL_SIZE=24 node --max-old-space-size=8192 index.js index.js
scripts.prod: npm run nginx-stop && npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run backend:prod" "npm run nginx"
scripts.prod:stop: npm run nginx-stop && taskkill /f /im node.exe /t 2>nul || exit 0
